header.title: THE STUDIO
header.p1: A PRIVATE SPACE DESIGNED TO WELCOME YOU IN THE BEST POSSIBLE CONDITIONS.
header.p2: AT STARLETTE, WE'VE CHOSEN THE MICRO DELUXE TO OFFER A MORE MODERN, CHIC, AND EFFECTIVE VERSION OF THE CLASSIC METHOD. CUTTING EDGE TECHNOLOGY IN THE SERVICE OF YOUR WELLNESS.
header.p3: HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS, COLORS DESIGNED BY DASSAULT SYSTEMES PAID ATTENTION TO EVERY DETAIL.
header.p4: GRIP SOCKS ARE AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE AT THE STUDIO.
header.p5: ENJOY A CHANGING ROOM WITH SHOWERS AND FRESH TOWELS, FOLLOWED BY A MOMENT OF RELAXATION IN OUR COZY LOUNGE â€” OVER A COFFEE, TEA, OR MATCHA.
header.p6: A WARM ATMOSPHERE, CURATED MUSIC, AND AN ENERGY THAT LIFTS YOU UP.
header.p7: EVERYTHING IS DESIGNED TO HELP YOU FOCUS ON WHAT'S ESSENTIAL: YOU.
